Arsene Wenger insists his services are at Mikel Arteta's disposal and he will return to the Emirates if the Arsenal boss calls on him.

articles.title: Tottenham and West Ham players who breached Tier 4 Covid-19 rules SLAMMED - Daily Mail
articles.description: After breaking the law and brazenly violating Tier 4 Covid-19 rules over Christmas, fans have turned on the Spurs and West Ham players responsible and called for bans and point deductions.
